tags.returns: methods - functions to manipulate with the Field Arrays (dynamic inputs) {@link UseFieldArrayReturn }

description: A custom hook that exposes convenient methods to perform operations with a list of dynamic inputs that need to be appended, updated, removed etc. • [Demo](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-usefieldarray-ssugn) • [Video](https://youtu.be/4MrbfGSFY2A)

type.name: ({ validate?: Validate<FieldArray<TFieldValues, TFieldArrayName>[], TFieldValues> | Record<string, Validate<FieldArray<...>[], TFieldValues>>; } & Pick<...>)
